title: [Large-scale] Video-based Teaching Method Design for Science Education in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Science learning course using video content integrated with simulation/VR in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% improvement in comprehension through educational videos explaining scientific concepts.
Learners accurately replicate complex scientific experiment procedures more than three times using VR simulation-linked video materials.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply over 90% of video-based learning content to real-world tasks through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
